title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Advanced multicloud cost reporting with FOCUS (COP419)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 FOCUS 进行高级多云成本报告 (COP419)
abstract: In this interactive code talk, we'll dive into adopting the FinOps Open Cost and Usage Specification (FOCUS) for unified cloud cost reporting. Participants will learn how to overcome cross-cloud reporting challenges, implement the FOCUS data model, query FOCUS data and visualize the data across multiple providers using FOCUS's standardized schema. Leave with working code samples and practical strategies to implement FOCUS in your organization, enabling true financial transparency across your multicloud environment.
abstract_cn: 在这个互动代码讲座中，我们将深入探讨如何采用FinOps开放成本和使用规范（FOCUS）来实现统一的云成本报告。参与者将学习如何克服跨云报告挑战，实施FOCUS数据模型，查询FOCUS数据，并使用FOCUS的标准化架构在多个提供商之间可视化数据。您将获得可用的代码示例和实用策略来在您的组织中实施FOCUS，从而在您的多云环境中实现真正的财务透明度。
